scripts.swagger:gen: curl --insecure http://localhost:4720/swagger/v1/swagger.json --output swagger.json && node_modules/@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli/bin/openapi-generator generate -i ./swagger.json -g typescript-angular -o src/app/generated/cite.api --additional-properties ngVersion=20 --additional-properties useRxJS6=true --additional-properties modelPropertyNaming=original --type-mappings=DateTime=Date --skip-validate-spec
scripts.swagger:gen-docker: docker run --rm -v %CD%:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v7.15.0 generate -i http://host.docker.internal:4720/swagger/v1/swagger.json -g typescript-angular -o /local/src/app/generated/cite.api --additional-properties ngVersion=20 --additional-properties useRxJS6=true --additional-properties modelPropertyNaming=original --type-mappings=DateTime=Date --skip-validate-spec
scripts.docker:stack: npm run docker:stack:identity && npm run docker:stack:api
scripts.docker:stack:api: docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yml -c docker/compose/api.yml cite_stack
scripts.docker:stack:identity: docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yml -c docker/compose/identity.yml identity_stack
